article_title: Aetna-Humana Deal First Obamacare Health Deal

twitter.description:
Now that the Supreme Court has ruled, it’s time to deal.
Following the U.S. highest court’s ruling backing Obamacare, shares of Humana

twitter.title: Obamacare ruling greenlights Aetna-Humana dealmaking

article_metadata.keywords: aetna, humana, obamacare, merger, deal, health insurers, cigna, unitedhealthcare
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: aca, Affordable Care Act, healthcare, mergers, Obamacare, pubdesk, Supreme Court
article_metadata.description: Following the Obamacare ruling, Humana and Aetna could be the first insurers to combine in what could be a flurry of transactions.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Obamacare ruling greenlights Aetna-Humana dealmaking
article_metadata.news_keywords: Aetna, Humana, Obamacare, merger, deal, health insurers, Cigna, Unitedhealthcare
article_metadata.sailthru.description: But a competing offer from Cigna puts that deal and others up in the air.

og.title: Obamacare Ruling Greenlights Aetna-Humana Dealmaking
